column1: Below 18.5 Underweight   18.5 – 24.9 Normal or Healthy Weight >25.0 – 29.9 Overweight      > 30.0 Obese
The 5 marked characters that look like spaces are non-breaking spaces
The 2 marked characters that look like dashes are en dashes: three bytes: e2 80 93
A tentative theory is that REDCap replaced the en dashes with normal single-byte dashes
but at the time of this writing

column2: it looks like maybe the Byte Order Mark (BOM) was added when we added the en dash

column1: but that also needs to be confirmed.
